title: Change all text across the app to white (global font color)

requirements.text: Set the global default text color to pure white across the entire React app by updating the Tailwind color tokens so that `text-foreground` renders white in both light and dark modes.

quotes: change to colour of all font to white

acceptanceCriteria: All pages (Home, About, Programs, Caf√©, Membership, Contact) render default body text in white without requiring per-component changes.
In both light and dark mode, `body` continues to use `@apply ... text-foreground`, and the resolved `foreground` color is white.
No regressions to layout/spacing occur as a result of the color token changes.

requirements.text: Ensure all user-visible text remains white even where components currently apply explicit non-white text utility classes (e.g., `text-muted-foreground`, `text-primary`, `hover:text-primary`, `text-green-accent`, `text-gold`), including interactive states such as hover and focus.

quotes: change to colour of all font to white

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation labels in the header remain white in normal, active, and hover states.
Footer link text and footer meta text remain white in normal and hover states, and icons/text that were previously yellow accent (e.g., `text-primary`) are updated to white.
Text in CTA areas (buttons, banners, forms) remains white unless the text is part of a non-text graphic (e.g., an image).

requirements.text: Apply the same white-foreground token update consistently in all active global stylesheet entrypoints used by the frontend build (including both `frontend/src/index.css` and `frontend/index.css` if the project still ships both), so there is no environment-dependent mismatch in text color.
acceptanceCriteria: The app renders white text consistently in local dev and production builds.
There is a single, consistent source of truth for the white foreground token across global CSS files used by the build.

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead of editing).

Do not edit immutable auth/actor bootstrap hooks: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, and `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend remains single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing background colors, button background colors, or the overall yellow branding theme (beyond making text white).
Adding new pages, routes, or features unrelated to text color.
Any backend schema/state changes or migrations.
